This home offers 1,575 square feet of living space a finished basement, exposed brick features on each floor, a custom-made open tread steel staircase, hardwood floors throughout, and recessed lighting. This location offers walk-ability to the Berks St El Stop, the Frankford Arts Corridor, minutes from Fishtown, close to multiple parks, and a convenient commute to Center City. title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom Townhouse for Rent!
description: Welcome to this highly desired one level living Ranch townhouse with a huge finished basement located in the Highlands in New Britain Township and the highly rated Central Bucks School District. Step inside and you will notice the bright open floor plan featuring neutral paint throughout and hardwood floors running from the foyer into the dining room and the spacious great room featuring vaulted ceiling and tons of windows to let the sunlight spill in, also featuring built in bookshelves. A formal dining room is also just off the foyer and is adjacent to the eat in kitchen. The kitchen features an abundance of cabinets and counter space, newer stainless steel appliances and a cozy breakfast area which features a sliding door leading you out to the maintenance free deck and private yard. The master bedroom is spacious with vaulted ceiling offering a perfect retreat at the end of a long day featuring a well appointed master bathroom and huge walk in closet. Two additional nice size bedrooms offer large closets and share the hall bathroom. A large utility closet could house the washer and dryer if desired. Downstairs the huge basement features a large finished rec room and an additional finished room, perfect for a craft or hobby room. There is still lots of unfinished area which has a large laundry room and offers plenty of storage or room for further finished area. Located just minutes from shopping areas, and the major roadways for easy commuting. Parking is assigned an also has plenty of overflow spaces. Don't wait to be a part of this wonderful community

title: Charming trinity style home in the heart of Philadelphia
description:
This charming trinity style home in the heart of Philadelphia's vibrant Bella Vista neighborhood is now available for rent. This well kept one bedroom, one bathroom townhome boasts tons of character throughout. Featuring one room per floor with a spacious eat-in kitchen with access through the sliding glass doors to shared outdoor area. Upstairs on the second floor is a full bathroom with tub shower and down the hall is a nicely sized room that can be used as a second bedroom or the living/entertainment area. At the top of the stairs features a skylight, letting in an abundance of natural light in the staircase and the primary bedroom. Other amenities include laundry in the basement, ceiling fans throughout, and closet space in each room. With its convenient location, having easy access to public transportation and a short walk to local shops, restaurants cafes, and all the cultural attractions that Philadelphia is famous for. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to rent in one of Philadelphia's most sought-after areas! Pet(s) 50lbs and less accepted. First, Last & Security due at signing.
904 S Delhi St

title: Welcome to The Vine, the newest luxury condo!
description:
Welcome to The Vine, the newest luxury condo development by Philadelphia’s premier developer, Stamm Development, located in the heart of Francisville, just north of bustling Fairmount Avenue. This gorgeous unit boasts an open layout with a large kitchen featuring plenty of cabinet and countertop space, a bright and airy living room, and a huge bedroom. With its large 11’ ceilings, 1A feels wide open and spacious. The kitchen is the heart of this home and is decked out with two-tone UltraCraft cabinets, pure white quartz countertops, Delta Trinsic matte black fixtures, and Whirlpool stainless steel appliances, making it a chef's dream come true. The generously appointed bedroom features custom-built closets, while the bathroom boasts a deep soaking tub, custom vanity, and sleek black matte fixtures. Modern conveniences such as smart thermostats and Latch Technology secured front entry systems are included in all residences, providing an added layer of security and convenience. The building also features an incredible rooftop deck for all residents to enjoy, a private trash/recycling room, bike storage, and a mail room.
1723 Francis St #1A

title: Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home!
description:
Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home! This stunning newly constructed building is situated in the heart of Philadelphia and offers six units of modern luxury living. Unit #301 is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom apartment, boasting ample natural light and a private roof deck for your relaxation and enjoyment. Each unit in the building comes equipped with top-notch security features, including front door security cameras, alarm systems, and smart home intercom systems. You'll also enjoy a range of high-tech amenities, such as Nest thermostats, remote-controlled range hoods, rain shower heads, and garbage disposals. Inside your apartment, you'll be greeted by desirable features such as white oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, central air conditioning, and in-unit laundry facilities. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with navy and white cabinetry, stunning quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas range, and double-door refrigerator. The bedrooms are spacious and come with ample closet space, while the bathrooms boast unique tiling, floating wood vanities, and glass shower doors. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in the lap of luxury in Philadelphia. Schedule your tour today before it's too late!

title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905

title: Beautiful, sunny row house for rent at 49th and Larchwood
description:
A home at 49th and Larchwood in West Philly is available for rent beginning approximately May 2023. A two year lease is offered, ending approximately April or May 2025, with the possibility of an extension.
If interested, please read this notice in full.
Please note: the home is being renovated at this time.
The home features three bedrooms, a full bath, renovated kitchen, tall ceilings, cozy radiator heat and original hardwood floors. The home is approximately 1400 square feet.
The house has a front lawn, parking in a garage, with another additional parking space behind the garage. The block has friendly neighbors who know each other and have friendly meetings approximatley twice per year.
Rent is $2050 monthly. Tenant is responsible for all utilities.
Why the home is being rented: the owner works in healthcare and will be doing further healthcare training away from Philadelphia.
Note that basement of the house is used for storage, so the amount of storage available for the tenant is more limited.
Healthcare workers and graduate students are particularly welcome to apply, either as individual tenants or couples.
Please note: the photo shown is from another renovation done by the same general contractor in a nearby area of Philadelphia. It is NOT the finished home near 49th and Larchwood, but are offered to provide a sense of quality of work that will be done. The finished home will have the same feeling with original hardwood floors, modern kitchen with tile backsplash, etc.
Details:
- laundry is available in the basement.
a pet is welcome strictly at the owner's discretion
- smoking is not allowed by the owner in the house or on the property.
- AC window units are included.
If interested, please reply with information regarding:
- information on yourself (if you plan to rent yourself) or your group
- understanding that there is a third party verification service that is required in order to lease, with an application fee paid only to that third party service
- to confirm that you read this, a mention of your favorite Philadelphia restaurant/park/museum/neighborhood/whatever
- a confirmation of your interest in a two year lease that will begin in April or May of this year
- a confirmation that you understand that the basement might not be available for storage

title: On-site Parking, Coworking Space, Bike storage
description:
545 N Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 19123Welcome to Mily on Green. Designed for community, flexibility, and functionality, your new home offers spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with high-end appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, and built-in storage. You’ll find beautiful amenities right outside your door, including a second floor lounge ideal for working parents. Divided into several separate but interconnected spaces, the lounge offers room for coworking, family time, and group gatherings, along with a dedicated space for children and playtime. For a breath of fresh air, head up to the expansive rooftop deck. There you’ll find a cozy indoor lounge that looks out onto the 9,700 square foot green roof, complete with a variety of seating perfect for gazing onto city views or taking in the lush rooftop landscaping. title: Renovated Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Lounge, Near Cafes
description:
This 475 square foot Monet studio apartment home at 1413 on the 14th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home features neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as May 15, 2023!
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home at 1413 on 14th floor
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
* Large south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* Neutral carpet
* Renovated kitchen
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Granite kitchen counters
* White kitchen cabinets
* Renovated bathroom
Community Amenities:
* Laundry room on every floor and large laundry room on the 3rd floor
* Historic building on Rittenhouse Square
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with seating areas, pool table, printer, conference room, and kitchen
* Fitness center
* Guest suites
* Bicycle storage
* Front door attendant
* Concierge
* Sauna
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Dog spa
* Package lockers by Luxer One in 2nd floor package room
* Online resident portal RentCafe for maintenance requests, rent payments, lease renewals, and more
* 24-hour on-site maintenance
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
* Roof deck renovation due to be complete spring 2023

title: Everything in this unit is brand new!!
description:
This stunning corner and rare condo that is a fully renovated find, with many luxurious upgrades such as quartz countertops and luxury flooring throughout is in the heart of Washington Square. Everything in this unit is brand new, from the designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances to the upgraded bathroom, interior lighting, custom window treatments, and professionally painted interiors. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath unit provides spacious living in the heart of vibrant Washington Sq West, with nearby theaters, fine dining, coffee shops, top medical centers, idyllic parks, and myriad shopping options that offer a high quality, convenient standard of living. With no other tenants on the floor, this special unit is very private. Upon entering, the main living space is airy and open, with lots of natural light from a wall of windows at the front and side, and window treatments that can be raised or lowered for added privacy. The entire condo features modern, engineered hardwood floors. The tasteful kitchen offers upgraded gray cabinetry, white quartz waterfall counters, stainless steel appliances, Calacatta tile backsplash, deep double sinks, under cabinet hidden outlets, a large appliance cubby, pantry, an extended peninsula with pendant lighting, and comfortable seating for two or more. The primary master suite features a large bedroom, a walk-in closet, and a luxurious full bathroom with designer tile, a glass-enclosed shower, and dual access pocket doors. The second bedroom also has a walk-in closet. The entry hall includes multiple closets for coats, a washer/ dryer hook-up space, an electric water heater, and the central HVAC. title: you will LOVE living on Iseminger!
description:
Situated on a quiet, sweet street in Washington Square West, 410 S Iseminger ticks all the boxes of trinity living. This two-bedroom, one-bathroom home features TWO outdoor spaces and has been beautifully updated for both modern comfort and historic preservation. Just through the front door, you’re greeted with a quaint living room with a well-maintained original fireplace and coat closet. Making your way downstairs, you’ll find the renovated kitchen with cellar door access to the street (for unloading groceries) and outdoor space. The kitchen has all new appliances, a new backsplash, and repointed exposed brick walls. The back patio is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or work outside during a warm day. The first bedroom is found on the second floor of the home. Down the hall is the full bath featuring heated floors, a new toilet, and a new vanity. On the third floor of this trinity is the second bedroom with beautiful vaulted ceilings and exposed beams. Off of this bedroom is a little balcony. With two outdoor spaces, original hardwood floors, a basement for storage, central air, and close proximity to all your Center City favorites, you will LOVE living on Iseminger.
410 S Iseminger St
